Package manito.eft.interfaces

Interface EPSCore_1_3

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EPSCore, EPSCore_1_1, EPSCore_1_2
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EPSCore_1_4, EPSCore_1_5, EPSCore_1_6
    public interface EPSCore_1_3
extends EPSCore_1_2
    Extended Interface for EPSCore version 1.3.

    Interface history: 

       1.0 initial public interface - EPSCore
   1.1 added getCapCancellation()
   1.2 added posTransactionInProgress(long transactionNumber)
   1.3 added deviceAccess() for IFSF channel2 requests

      • deviceAccess

        DeviceResponse deviceAccess​(DeviceRequest request)
        Generic device access request.

        The call is blocking until the required action has been taken or responded to

        Parameters:
        request - DeviceRequest - request descriptor
        Returns:
        DeviceResponse - response details
